cab.content: BATTLE SITUATION - MORNING - APRIL 15th, 1918.-1. . After heavy fighting the enemy succeeded in capturing NEUVE EGLISE last night. The situation on this part of the front is still somewhat obscure.2. Prisoners captured yesterday stated that it is intended to capture BAILLEUL today, but so far no attacks have developed.3. As a result of an attack carried out by us north-west of LOCON about 100 prisoners were captured.4* A successful minor operation carried out last night by Australian troops South of the SOMME enabled us to improve our position slightly and capture a few prisoners * ?5. On the rest of the front there is no change..General Staff, ;War Office, S.W.I.- .15th April, 1918.Issued at 11.20. a.m.-
